name: The Lost Child (itch) (TaraTorp33do)
description:
Once upon a time there was a group of children's who lost in to the woods. 

It's resemble me of this forest. 

Four brave children swore an oath that they will do anything they can to find all the childrens who has lost or have been abandoned here.

 Deep in to the woods hide some scary secrets. 

Like these lost children's we also live our unfinished adventures. 

 So let our new adventure beging.

We all feel lost sometimes. 

The Lost Child tells a story about friendship.  

It is a 2D platformer game, where the player needs to clear the scary woods and find the lost child.

 So if you ever feel lost I believe that these lost children's will find you.

 And keep you safe this time.

The game can be played by one to four players. The game can connect Xbox One controllers.

- The Game was made in 48 hours for Xamk Game Jam II -

Thanks for playing be safe!
